question: What are the Islamic views on suffering and death as well as the after life?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:

In the Name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

As-salāmu ‘alaykum wa-rahmatullāhi wa-barakātuh.

As Muslims, we believe in resurrection (coming out of the graves) and accountability in the court of Allah. If we are successful in the court of Allah, Allah will bless us with Jannah (paradise). If we are unsuccessful, He may forgive us as He wish to.


And Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
